messages.title: What else aren't the Conservatives telling you?
Help us build a fairer Britain
messages.content: Help Berni Millam and the local Lib Dems win for local people by filling in and returning this form.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable's plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolishing university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: creating jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Nick Clegg, Vince Cable, David Cameron

issues.education: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolishing university tuition fees.
issues.environment: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
